description: Bitstream encoding for video, originally developed by Intel. John McGowan states that Indeo 3 employs vector quantization. Windows implementations of Indeo are distributed by Ligos Corporation; the Mac versions by Apple Corporation. Versions 3.1 and 3.2 are both covered by this document.
name: Indeo Video Codec, Version 3
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
